title: All Check for dashboard.
name: AllCheck
description: provide list of all check created by user. If user has admin role, can access all users check.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[{
    user_id: 1
    check_master_code: 'CORE',
    theme_id: 1,
    name_en: 'Name of check',
    description_en: 'Description of Check',

    tiny_url: 'https://sgoogle.com',

    email: '',
    conclusion: DataTypes.STRING,
    is_pro_report_ready: DataTypes.BOOLEAN
  }]
